_header: Jesu at morrow as Thou were take
_description: The Hours of the Cross — eight 6-line stanzas

CamStJohn237.First Lines:
Ihesu at morow as þow were takeOff kythe of kynne sone
                    forsake…
CamStJohn237.Last Lines:
…In heuene blys to haue a placeAnd Ioy with outten
                    Ende
